entry.tran: 开颜；露出喜色；快乐起来
entry.def: If someone brightens or their face brightens, they suddenly look happier.

example.ex: Seeing him, she seemed to brighten a little...
example.tran: 看到他后，她似乎露出点儿喜色。

example.ex: 'Oh, we'd love to!' cried Nancy, her face brightening.
example.tran: “哦，我们很乐意！”南希面露喜色，大声说道。

entry.def: If your eyes brighten, you suddenly look interested or excited.

example.ex: His eyes brightened and he laughed...
Her tearful eyes brightened with interest.
example.tran: 她含着泪水的双眼因为好奇而闪闪发亮。

entry.def: If someone or something brightens a place, they make it more colourful and attractive.

example.ex: Tubs planted with wallflowers brightened the area outside the door.
example.tran: 桂竹香盆栽为门外的景致增色不少。

entry.def: If someone or something brightens a situation or the situation brightens, it becomes more pleasant, enjoyable, or favourable.

example.ex: That does not do much to brighten the prospects of kids in the city...
example.tran: 那并不能使城里孩子们的前途更光明些。

example.ex: It is undeniable that the economic picture is brightening.
example.tran: 不可否认经济状况正在好转。

entry.def: When a light brightens a place or when a place brightens, it becomes brighter or lighter.

example.ex: The sky above the ridge of mountains brightened...
example.tran: 山脊上方的天空变得明亮起来。

example.ex: The late afternoon sun brightened the interior of the church.
example.tran: 傍晚的太阳照亮了教堂内部。

entry.def: If the weather brightens, it becomes less cloudy or rainy, and the sun starts to shine.

example.ex: By early afternoon the weather had brightened.

sentences.sentence: "Her face brightened when she heard the good news"

auth_sentence.content: Thank heavens we have this chat to brighten it!
auth_sentence.res_content: Thank heavens we have this chat to brighten it!

auth_sentence.content: His actions this week will not brighten his immediate prospect of joining it.
auth_sentence.res_content: His actions this week will not brighten his immediate prospect of joining it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His actions this week will not brighten his immediate prospect of joining it.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

Sentence.sentence: They brighten in parks and gardens as they fly among the flowers.

sentences.en: In the distance, the sky was beginning to brighten.
White paint will brighten the room.
sentences.cn: 白漆将会使房子更明亮。

sentences.en: Some fresh paint will brighten this place up.
sentences.cn: 色彩鲜明的油漆可以把这个地方弄亮些。

sentences.en: After a dull start, it should brighten up later.
sentences.cn: 早晨阴天，过会儿就会晴朗。

sentences.en: He brightened up when they said he could go with them.
sentences.cn: 他们说他可以一起去，他就高兴起来。

means.word_mean: 使更加有趣(或令人兴奋、有吸引力)

sentences.en: I’ve brought some flowers to brighten the place up a bit.
sentences.cn: 我带来一些花，把这里装点一下。

sentences.en: Brighten up your bedroom with a few posters.
sentences.cn: 挂几张印刷画让你的寝室亮丽生色。
